name: Super Shoot Owl
description: Owly has been kidnapped by the treacherous Tala. Fight your way through hordes of evil llamas in a quest of liberation and vengeance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Anything better than Intel Celeron Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Anything better than Intel HD Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space
